channel.title: A new Revolution to RSPS gaming 317
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to Skull-Catcher Rsps coder and DarkOne have been working together for the last week deciding on making a nice unique 317 so we have came to the conclusion on what people want to what i think they want and we have made a runescape private server based off peoples ideas not just one persons idea on how the rsps should look like.
We have decided to make a Project Insanity 317 called Skull-catcher, We are going to make sure we included all aspects of Skilling, Monster killing and most of all Player killing.
We came to the conclusion of adding all three aspects into a game like a 317 so all plays can enjoy the full game content instead of a 718 with map dumps everywhere.
More information including media coming soon!
Website - www.skull-catcher.co.uk Webclient - www.skull-catcher.co.uk/Play.html Downloadable client - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/69957337/client.jar Vote - http://skull-catcher.co.uk/Vote Highscores - http://skull-catcher.co.uk/Highscores/ Donate -
Features: -12 Bosses, and more to come! -8 Minigames, and more to come! -Highscores! -Bank Pin! -Show Items kept on Death Window! -Slayer System with Reward Shop! -Experiments -Penguins -LvL point shop! -Custom Zombie Minigame! -Custom revent Minigame!
Minigames: -Fully working Barrows -Duel Arena for Staking Adventures -Pest Control -Warriors Guild -Fight Caves -Castle Wars -Fight Pits
Bosses: -Fully working Godwars Dungeon -Dagannoth Kings -Frost Dragons -Tormented Demons -King Black Dragon (Lvl. 40 Wildy, with warning) -Nex -Nomad -Corporeal Beast -Chaos Elemental -Barrelchest Boss -Glacors -Avatar of Destruction
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4a2CqUt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U4o7afg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1xsVVJA.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7jYMJWk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XQIJaMH.jpg[/img]
Donator monsters: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qnrUvCb.jpg[/img] To do: - Fix summoning - Fix wood cutting so more hatchets work - add custom portals to diferent zones - Add more custom npcs - Add more teleports to npcs - Updates interfaces
26/03/2014 Updates: - Fixed Npc clipping - Added Experiments - Added Barrows on hills (x5) - Fixed Highscore system - Fixed special attacks
24/03/2014 Updates - Added more shops - Added better items in shops - Fixed monster facing - fixed dragon claw special
We are aiming to get as many people on board this idea as we possible can.
We are currently in BETA [/center]

@naseem142 wrote:

I had only enough time to post 1 picture … Kids

item.title: A new Revolution to RSPS gaming 317
item.dc:creator: @Combatx Combatx
item.description:
@Combatx wrote:

[center]Welcome to Skull-Catcher Rsps coder and DarkOne have been working together for the last week deciding on making a nice unique 317 so we have came to the conclusion on what people want to what i think they want and we have made a runescape private server based off peoples ideas not just one persons idea on how the rsps should look like.

We have decided to make a Project Insanity 317 called Skull-catcher,
We are going to make sure we included all aspects of Skilling, Monster killing and most of all Player killing.

We came to the conclusion of adding all three aspects into a game like a 317 so all plays can enjoy the full game content instead of a 718 with map dumps everywhere.

More information including media coming soon!

Website - www.skull-catcher.co.uk
Webclient - www.skull-catcher.co.uk/Play.html
Downloadable client - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/69957337/client.jar
Vote - http://skull-catcher.co.uk/Vote
Highscores - http://skull-catcher.co.uk/Highscores/
Donate -

Features:
-12 Bosses, and more to come!
-8 Minigames, and more to come!
-Highscores!
-Bank Pin!
-Show Items kept on Death Window!
-Slayer System with Reward Shop!
-Experiments
-Penguins
-LvL point shop!
-Custom Zombie Minigame!
-Custom revent Minigame!

Minigames:
-Fully working Barrows
-Duel Arena for Staking Adventures
-Pest Control
-Warriors Guild
-Fight Caves
-Castle Wars
-Fight Pits

Bosses:
-Fully working Godwars Dungeon
-Dagannoth Kings
-Frost Dragons
-Tormented Demons
-King Black Dragon (Lvl. 40 Wildy, with warning)
-Nex
-Nomad
-Corporeal Beast
-Chaos Elemental
-Barrelchest Boss
-Glacors
-Avatar of Destruction

Donator monsters:

To do:

  • Fix summoning
  • Fix wood cutting so more hatchets work
  • add custom portals to diferent zones
  • Add more custom npcs
  • Add more teleports to npcs
  • Updates interfaces

26/03/2014
Updates:

  • Fixed Npc clipping
  • Added Experiments
  • Added Barrows on hills (x5)
  • Fixed Highscore system
  • Fixed special attacks

24/03/2014
Updates

  • Added more shops
  • Added better items in shops
  • Fixed monster facing
  • fixed dragon claw special

We are aiming to get as many people on board this idea as we possible can.

We are currently in BETA [/center]
